Text: Columbia BSchoolBen Unfortunately I have some bad news I just received a fax from Sidney who reported that your application is going to be rejected notwithstanding the fact that he wrote a letter in support Please give me a call and lets discuss Dad

REHopefully you will get credit or at least some recognition for the important role you played But you shouldnt be terribly disappointed if you dont I have found in business that you dont always get credit for the things that you truly achieved and yet sometimes you get more credit for things than you believe that you deserved The relationship between contribution and credit is often difficult to predict and sometimes defies logic I believe you stepped in and made a meaningful difference in this deal Dad Original Message From mailto Sent Monday December PM To Subject Dad Thanks for talking to Cyrus for me I hope that will be enough to get Dave and Don to promote me to manager since I clearly deserve it with this transaction I dont think there as been a manager much less an Associate my level has done a deal like this and that is exactly what I am going to tell Don Miller and Dave Delainey Our PRC meetings our going on right now and I trying to get this done right away Thanks again for taking the time to talk to Michael Ben

REI hope I passed the testThe retreat went very well Ive been thinking about your role at Cinergy and have concluded that involvement in the DG area is the best place for you to grow and develop as an executive The assignment will be tough because you will be front running the market But the opportunity to develop an expertise in marketing in this area will be invaluable if the industry develops as I believe it will Lets talk Dad Original Message From mailto Sent Monday October PM To Subject This is a test to see if you are checking your email these days I have a feeling that you have not been due to your board presentation last week Mike M tells me he will be up there today hope that goes well for you guys I really think there could be something there Please give me a call sometime soon Things are going well here and we have been quite busy Give me a call sometime The number is See ya Ben
